name: BOM Stock Report
query:
SELECT 
	bom_item.item_code as "Item:Link/Item:200",
	bom_item.description as "Description:Data:300",
	bom_item.qty as "Required Qty:Float:100",
	ledger.actual_qty  as "In Stock Qty:Float:100",
	FLOOR(ledger.actual_qty /bom_item.qty) as "Enough Parts to Build:Int:100"
FROM
	`tabBOM Item` AS bom_item 
	LEFT JOIN `tabBin` AS ledger	
		ON bom_item.item_code = ledger.item_code  
		AND ledger.warehouse = %(warehouse)s
WHERE
	bom_item.parent=%(bom)s

GROUP BY bom_item.item_code

name: Asset Maintenance
Ordered Items To Be Delivered
query:
select 
 `tabSales Order`.`name` as "Sales Order:Link/Sales Order:120",
 `tabSales Order`.`status` as "Status:Data:120",
 `tabSales Order`.`customer` as "Customer:Link/Customer:120",
 `tabSales Order`.`customer_name` as "Customer Name::150",
 `tabSales Order`.`transaction_date` as "Date:Date",
 `tabSales Order`.`project` as "Project:Link/Project:120",
 `tabSales Order Item`.item_code as "Item:Link/Item:120",
 `tabSales Order Item`.qty as "Qty:Float:140",
 `tabSales Order Item`.delivered_qty as "Delivered Qty:Float:140",
 (`tabSales Order Item`.qty - ifnull(`tabSales Order Item`.delivered_qty, 0)) as "Qty to Deliver:Float:140",
 `tabSales Order Item`.base_rate as "Rate:Float:140",
 `tabSales Order Item`.base_amount as "Amount:Float:140",
 ((`tabSales Order Item`.qty - ifnull(`tabSales Order Item`.delivered_qty, 0))*`tabSales Order Item`.base_rate) as "Amount to Deliver:Float:140",
 `tabBin`.actual_qty as "Available Qty:Float:120",
 `tabBin`.projected_qty as "Projected Qty:Float:120",
 `tabSales Order Item`.`delivery_date` as "Item Delivery Date:Date:120",
  DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),`tabSales Order Item`.`delivery_date`) as "Delay Days:Int:120",
 `tabSales Order Item`.item_name as "Item Name::150",
 `tabSales Order Item`.description as "Description::200",
 `tabSales Order Item`.item_group as "Item Group:Link/Item Group:120",
 `tabSales Order Item`.warehouse as "Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:200"
from
 `tabSales Order` JOIN `tabSales Order Item` 
 LEFT JOIN `tabBin` ON (`tabBin`.item_code = `tabSales Order Item`.item_code
 and `tabBin`.warehouse = `tabSales Order Item`.warehouse)
where
 `tabSales Order Item`.`parent` = `tabSales Order`.`name`
 and `tabSales Order`.docstatus = 1
 and `tabSales Order`.status not in ("Stopped", "Closed")
 and ifnull(`tabSales Order Item`.delivered_qty,0) < ifnull(`tabSales Order Item`.qty,0)
order by `tabSales Order`.transaction_date asc

name: Customers Without Any Sales Transactions
query:
SELECT
	`tabCustomer`.name as "Customer:Link/Customer:120",
	`tabCustomer`.customer_name as "Customer Name::120",
	`tabCustomer`.territory as "Territory:Link/Territory:120",
	`tabCustomer`.customer_group as "Customer Group:Link/Customer Group:120"

	`tabCustomer`

	not exists(select name from `tabSales Invoice` where `tabCustomer`.name = `tabSales Invoice`.customer and `tabSales Invoice`.docstatus=1 limit 1)

name: Purchase Order Items To Be Received or Billed
query:
SELECT
	`poi_pri`.`purchase_order` as "Purchase Order:Link/Purchase Order:120",
	`poi_pri`.`status` as "Status:Data:120",
	`poi_pri`.`transaction_date` as "Date:Date:100",
	`poi_pri`.`schedule_date` as "Reqd by Date:Date:110",
	`poi_pri`.`supplier` as "Supplier:Link/Supplier:120",
	`poi_pri`.`supplier_name` as "Supplier Name::150",
	`poi_pri`.`item_code` as "Item Code:Link/Item:120",
	`poi_pri`.`qty` as "Qty:Float:100",
	`poi_pri`.`base_amount` as  "Base Amount:Currency:100",
	`poi_pri`.`received_qty` as "Received Qty:Float:100",
	`poi_pri`.`received_amount` as "Received Qty Amount:Currency:100",
	`poi_pri`.`qty_to_receive` as "Qty to Receive:Float:100",
	`poi_pri`.`amount_to_be_received` as "Amount to Receive:Currency:100",
	`poi_pri`.`billed_amount` as  "Billed Amount:Currency:100",
	`poi_pri`.`amount_to_be_billed` as  "Amount To Be Billed:Currency:100",
	SUM(`pii`.`qty`) AS "Billed Qty:Float:100",
	`poi_pri`.qty - SUM(`pii`.`qty`) AS "Qty To Be Billed:Float:100",
	`poi_pri`.`warehouse` as "Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:150",
	`poi_pri`.`item_name` as "Item Name::150",
	`poi_pri`.`description` as "Description::200",
	`poi_pri`.`brand` as "Brand::100",
	`poi_pri`.`project` as "Project",
	`poi_pri`.`company` as "Company:Link/Company:"
FROM
	(SELECT
		`po`.`name` AS 'purchase_order',
		`po`.`status`,
		`po`.`company`,
		`poi`.`warehouse`,
		`poi`.`brand`,
		`poi`.`description`,
		`po`.`transaction_date`,
		`poi`.`schedule_date`,
		`po`.`supplier`,
		`po`.`supplier_name`,
		`poi`.`project`,
		`poi`.`item_code`,
		`poi`.`item_name`,
		`poi`.`qty`,
		`poi`.`base_amount`,
		`poi`.`received_qty`,
		(`poi`.billed_amt * ifnull(`po`.conversion_rate, 1)) as billed_amount,
		(`poi`.base_amount - (`poi`.billed_amt * ifnull(`po`.conversion_rate, 1))) as amount_to_be_billed,
		`poi`.`qty` - IFNULL(`poi`.`received_qty`, 0) AS 'qty_to_receive',
		(`poi`.`qty` - IFNULL(`poi`.`received_qty`, 0)) * `poi`.`rate` AS 'amount_to_be_received',
		SUM(`pri`.`amount`) AS 'received_amount',
		`poi`.`name` AS 'poi_name',
		`pri`.`name` AS 'pri_name'
	FROM
		`tabPurchase Order` po
		LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Order Item` poi
		ON `poi`.`parent` = `po`.`name`
		LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Receipt Item` pri
		ON `pri`.`purchase_order_item` = `poi`.`name`
			AND `pri`.`docstatus`=1
	WHERE
		`po`.`status` not in ('Stopped', 'Closed')
		AND `po`.`docstatus` = 1
		AND IFNULL(`poi`.`received_qty`, 0) < IFNULL(`poi`.`qty`, 0)
	GROUP BY `poi`.`name`
	ORDER BY `po`.`transaction_date` ASC
	) poi_pri
	LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Invoice Item` pii
	ON `pii`.`po_detail` = `poi_pri`.`poi_name`
		AND `pii`.`docstatus`=1
GROUP BY `poi_pri`.`poi_name`

name: Purchase Order Register
query:
select 
    `tabPurchase Order`.`name` as "PO:Link/Purchase Order:150",
  	`tabPurchase Order`.`transaction_date` as "Date:Date:100",
  	"PO" as "PO Type:20",
	`tabPurchase Order`.`supplier` as "Supplier:Link/Supplier:200",
	`tabPurchase Order`.`status` as "Status:Data:100",
	`tabPurchase Order Item`.`item_group` as "Group:data:100",
	`tabPurchase Order Item`.`item_group` as "Category:data:100",
	`tabPurchase Order Item`.`item_name` as "Item:data:200",
	`tabPurchase Order Item`.item_code as "Item Code:data:100",
	"INR" as "Currency:50",
	`tabPurchase Order Item`.rate as "Rate:Data:50",
	`tabPurchase Order Item`.received_qty as "Recd. Qty:Float:100", 
    `tabPurchase Order Item`.stock_uom as "Unit:Data:50",
    `tabPurchase Order Item`.amount as "Grand Total:Float:100",
    `tabPurchase Order Item`.net_amount as "Net Total:Float:100",
    `tabPurchase Order`.order_confirmation_no as "Purchase Quotation:Data:100"
from
	`tabPurchase Order`, `tabPurchase Order Item`
where
	`tabPurchase Order Item`.`parent` = `tabPurchase Order`.`name`
	and `tabPurchase Order`.docstatus = 1
	and ifnull(`tabPurchase Order Item`.received_qty, 0) < ifnull(`tabPurchase Order Item`.qty, 0)
	and `tabPurchase Order`.transaction_date>=%(from_date)s and `tabPurchase Order`.transaction_date<=%(to_date)s
order by `tabPurchase Order`.transaction_date asc

name: PO Register
query:
select
   po.name as "PO Number:Link/Purchase Order:150",
   po.transaction_date as "PO Date:Date",
   po.workflow_state as "Auth.Status",
   po.schedule_date as "Valid Upto Date:Date",
   po.supplier as "Vendor Name",
   pi.item_name as "Item Name",
   pi.item_code as "Item Code",
   pi.item_group as "Group Name",
   pi.qty as "Qty",
   pi.stock_qty-pi.received_qty as "Pending Qty",
   pi.rate as "Rate",
   pi.uom as "Base Unit"
   
from `tabPurchase Order` po ,`tabPurchase Order Item` pi

where pi.parent=po.name

	pi.item_code as "Part No:data:100",
	pi.item_group as "Group Name:data:100",
    item.category as "Category:data:100",

	"INR" as "Currency:50",
	pi.rate as "Rate:Data:50",

name: PO Reg
query:
select
   po.name as "PO Number:Link/Purchase Order:110",
   date(po.creation) as "Creation Date", 
   time(po.creation) as "Creation Time",
   date(po.modified) as "Modified Date",
   time(po.modified) as "Modified Time",
   po.po_type as "PO Type:Data:100",
   po.po_sub_type as "PO Sub Type:Data:100",
   po.transaction_date as "PO Date:Date",
   po.workflow_state as "Auth.Status",
   po.company as "Company",
   po.schedule_date as "Valid Upto Date:Date",
   po.status as "PO Status:Data:120",
   po.supplier as "Vendor Name::170",
   pi.item_name as "Item Name::200",
   pi.item_code as "Item Code::100",
   pi.item_group as "Group Name::120",
   item.item_sub_group as "Item sub Group",
   pi.qty as "Qty:Float:100",
   pi.stock_qty-pi.received_qty as "Pending Qty:Float:100",
   pi.rate as "Rate:Float:70",
   pi.uom as "Base Unit",
   pi.price_list_rate as "Before Discount Rate",
   pi.discount_percentage as "Discount on Price List Rate",
   po.additional_discount_percentage as "Additional Discount Percentage",
   po.discount_amount as "Additional Discount Amount",
   pi.cost_center as "Cost Center:Link/Cost Center:110"
from `tabPurchase Order` po ,`tabPurchase Order Item` pi  ,`tabItem` item

where pi.parent=po.name and
item.item_code=pi.item_code and po.transaction_date>=%(from_date)s and  po.transaction_date<=%(to_date)s
and po.company=%(company)s
and po.po_type=%(po_type)s
order by  po.transaction_date desc;

name: Purchase Return DFM
query:
SELECT
`tabPurchase Receipt`.`name` as "Purchase Receipt:Link/Purchase Receipt:150",
CASE WHEN `tabPurchase Receipt`.`docstatus` = 0 THEN "Pending"
    WHEN `tabPurchase Receipt`.`docstatus` = 1 THEN "Approved"
    ELSE "Cancelled"
    END AS "Status:150",
`tabPurchase Receipt`.`supplier` as "Supplier:Link/Supplier:150",
`tabPurchase Receipt`.`posting_date` as "Date:Date:150",
`tabPurchase Receipt`.`company` as "Company:Link/Company:200",
`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`item_name` as "Item Name:Data:100",
`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`item_code` as "Item Code:Link/Item:150",
`tabItem`.item_sub_group as "Item sub Group",
`tabItem`.item_group as "Item Group",
`tabItem`.category as "Category",
`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`received_qty` as "Received Quantity:Data:100"

FROM
`tabPurchase Receipt`, `tabPurchase Receipt Item`,`tabItem` 
WHERE
`tabPurchase Receipt`.`is_return` = true and 
`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`parent`=`tabPurchase Receipt`.`name` and 
`tabItem`.item_code=`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.item_code 
and `tabPurchase Receipt`.`posting_date`  >= %(from_date)s and `tabPurchase Receipt`.`posting_date`<= %(to_date)s and `tabPurchase Receipt`.`company` = %(company)s

name: MRN Against Delivery Note DFM
query:
SELECT
`tabPurchase Receipt`.`name` as "Purchase Receipt:Link/Purchase Receipt:150",
CASE WHEN `tabPurchase Receipt`.`docstatus` = 0 THEN "Pending"
    WHEN `tabPurchase Receipt`.`docstatus` = 1 THEN "Approved"
    ELSE "Cancelled"
    END AS "Status:150",
`tabPurchase Receipt`.`supplier` as "Supplier:Link/Supplier:150",
`tabPurchase Receipt`.`posting_date` as "Date:Date:100",
`tabPurchase Receipt`.`company` as "Company:Link/Company:200",
`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`item_name` as "Item Name:Data:100",
`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`item_code` as "Item Code:Link/Item:150",
`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`invoice_quantity` as "Invoice Quantity:Data:100",
`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`manufacturing_date` as "Manufacturing Date:Date100",
`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`expiry_date` as "Expiry Date:Date100"
FROM

query:

 b.batch_id as "Batch No:Data:100",
 b.item as "Item Code:Data:100",

 b.manufacturing_date as "Manufacturing Date:Date",
 b.expiry_date as "Expiry Date:Date",

  `tabBatch` b , `tabItem` i

query:
select
   po.name as "PO Number:Link/Purchase Order:110",
   po.po_type as "PO Type:Data:100",
   po.po_sub_type as "PO Sub Type:Data:100",
   po.transaction_date as "PO Date:Date",
   po.workflow_state as "Auth.Status",
   po.creation as "Creation Date and Time",
   po.company as "Company",
   po.schedule_date as "Valid Upto Date:Date",
   po.status as "PO Status:Data:120",
   po.supplier as "Vendor Name::170",
   pi.item_name as "Item Name::200",
   pi.item_code as "Item Code::100",
   pi.item_group as "Group Name::120",
   item.item_sub_group as "Item sub Group",
   pi.qty as "Qty:Float:100",
   pi.stock_qty-pi.received_qty as "Pending Qty:Float:100",
   pi.rate as "Rate:Float:70",
   pi.uom as "Base Unit",
   pi.price_list_rate as "Before Discount Rate",
   pi.discount_percentage as "Discount on Price List Rate",
   po.additional_discount_percentage as "Additional Discount Percentage",
   po.discount_amount as "Additional Discount Amount",
   pi.cost_center as "Cost Center:Link/Cost Center:110"
from `tabPurchase Order` po ,`tabPurchase Order Item` pi  ,`tabItem` item

where pi.parent=po.name and
item.item_code=pi.item_code and po.transaction_date>=%(from_date)s and  po.transaction_date<=%(to_date)s

and po.po_type=%(po_type)s
order by  po.transaction_date desc;

name: Testing
query:
select
se.name  as "No:Link/Stock Entry",
se.company as "Company",
se.stock_entry_type as "Stock Entry Type",
se.reason as "Reason",
se.posting_date as "Date:Date",
se.posting_time as "Time:TIME",
se.work_order as "Work Order",
se.line as "Line",
se.bom_no as "Bom No",
se.bom_item as "Bom Item:200",
se.fg_completed_qty as "Fg Quantity:Float",
sed.s_warehouse as "Source Warehouse",
sed.t_warehouse as "Target Warehouse",
sed.item_code as "Item Code",
sed.item_name as "Item Name",
sed.item_group as "Item Group",
case
    when sed.s_warehouse is NULL then -1*sed.qty else sed.qty end as "Quantity:Float",
sed.basic_rate as "Basic Rate:Float",
case
    when sed.s_warehouse is NULL then -1*sed.basic_amount else sed.basic_amount end as "Basic Amount:Float",
sed.additional_cost as "Additional Cost:Float",
case
    when sed.s_warehouse is NULL then -1*sed.amount  else sed.amount end as "Amount:Float",
sed.uom as "UOM",
sed.batch_no as "Batch No",
sed.expense_account as "Expense Account:Float",
sed.actual_qty as "Actual QTY:Float",
se.total_incoming_value as "Total Imcoming Value:Float",
se.total_outgoing_value as "Total Outgoing Value:Float",
se.value_difference as "Value Difference:Float"

from `tabStock Entry` se , `tabStock Entry Detail` sed

where 
sed.parent=se.name and 
(se.stock_entry_type = "Manufacture" or
(se.stock_entry_type = "Material Issue" and se.reason = "Consumption" ) or 
(se.stock_entry_type = "Material Receipt" and se.reason = "Consumption" )) and
se.docstatus=1 and
sed.item_group != 'Finished Goods'
order by se.posting_date desc;

    `tabPurchase Order`.workflow_state as "Status:Data:100",
    `tabPurchase Order Item`.item_code as "Part No:data:100",
    `tabPurchase Order Item`.item_name as "Item:data:200",
	`tabPurchase Order Item`.item_group as "Group:data:100",

	`tabPurchase Order Item`.qty as "Total PO Qty:Float:100",
	 `tabPurchase Order Item`.stock_uom as "Unit:Data:50",
	`tabPurchase Order Item`.rate as "Rate:Data:50",
	
   
    `tabPurchase Order`.l1_approval_date as "L1 Approval Date:Date:50",
    `tabPurchase Order`.l1_approved_by as "L1 Approved By:Data:50",
    `tabPurchase Order`.l2_approval_date as "L2 Approval Date:Date:50",
    `tabPurchase Order`.l2_approved_by as "L2 Approved By:Data:50",
    `tabPurchase Order`.l3_approval_date as "L3 Approval Date:Date:50",
    `tabPurchase Order`.l3_approved_by as "L3 Approved By:Data:50",
    `tabPurchase Receipt`.name as "MRN Number:Link/Purchase Receipt:200",
    `tabPurchase Receipt`.status as "MRN Status:Data:200",
    `tabPurchase Receipt`.posting_date as "MRN Date:Date:200",
    `tabPurchase Receipt`.creation as "MRN Created on:Date:200",
    `tabPurchase Receipt`.owner as "MRN Created By:Data:200",
    `tabPurchase Receipt`.mrn_approval_date as "MRN Approval Date:Data:200",
    `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.item_code as "MRN Item Name:Data:200",
    `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.item_name as "MRN Item Name:Data:200",
    `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.received_qty as "MRN Received Quantity:Data:200",
    `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.qty as "MRN Accepted Quantity:Data:200",
    `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.rejected_qty as "MRN Rejected Quantity:Data:200",
    `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.received_qty as "MRN Received Quantity:Data:200",
    `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.stock_uom as "MRN UOM:Data:200",
    `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.rate as "MRN Rate:Data:200",
    `tabPurchase Invoice`.name as "Purchase Invoice:Link/Purchase Invoice:200",
    `tabPurchase Invoice`.creation as "PI Created on:Date:200",
    `tabPurchase Invoice`.posting_date as "PI Posting Date:Data:200",
    
    `tabPurchase Invoice`.pi_approval_date as "PI Approval Date:Date:200",
    `tabPurchase Invoice Item`.item_code as "PI Item Code:Data:200",
    `tabPurchase Invoice Item`.item_name as "PI Item Name:Data:200",
    `tabPurchase Invoice Item`.uom as "PI UOM:Data:200",
    `tabPurchase Invoice Item`.rate as "PI Rate:Data:200",
    `tabPurchase Invoice Item`.amount as "PI Amount:Data:200",
    pe.name as "Payment Entry:Link/Payment Entry:200",
    pe.posting_date as "Payment Entry Date:Date:200"
    

    

from `tabPurchase Order`
   left join `tabPurchase Order Item` on `tabPurchase Order Item`.parent =  `tabPurchase Order`.name 
   left join `tabPurchase Receipt Item` on `tabPurchase Order`.name = `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.purchase_order
   left join `tabPurchase Receipt` on `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.parent= `tabPurchase Receipt`.name
   left join `tabPurchase Invoice` on `tabPurchase Receipt`.name = `tabPurchase Invoice`.mrn_number
   left join `tabPurchase Invoice Item` on `tabPurchase Invoice Item`.parent = `tabPurchase Invoice`.name
   left join  `tabPayment Entry Reference`p on `tabPurchase Invoice`.name = p.reference_name
   left join   `tabPayment Entry` pe on p.parent = pe.name
   
   where `tabPurchase Order`.transaction_date >= "2021-12-01" and `tabPurchase Order`.transaction_date <= "2021-12-12"

name: Semi Finished Production
query:
SELECT
se.name  as "No:Link/Stock Entry",
se.company as "Company",
se.stock_entry_type as "Stock Entry Type",
se.posting_date as "Date:Date",
se.work_order as "Work Order",
se.line as "Line",
sed.s_warehouse as "Source Warehouse",
sed.t_warehouse as "Target Warehouse",
se.bom_no as "Bom No",
sed.item_code as "Item Code",
sed.item_name as "Item Name",
sed.item_group as "Item Group",
it.product_category as "Product Category",
it.price_category as "Price Category",
it.product_variant as "Product Varient",
sed.qty as "Quantity:Float",
sed.basic_rate as "Basic Rate:Float",
sed.basic_amount as "Basic Amount:Float",
sed.amount as "Amount:Float",
sed.uom as "UOM",
sed.qty * ((it.weight_per_box)/1000) as "Net Weight(Kg)",
sed.batch_no as "Batch No",
sed.expense_account as "Expense Account:Float",
sed.actual_qty as "Actual QTY:Float",
se.total_incoming_value as "Total Imcoming Value:Float",
se.total_outgoing_value as "Total Outgoing Value:Float",
se.value_difference as "Value Difference:Float"

FROM 
`tabStock Entry Detail` sed LEFT JOIN `tabItem` it ON sed.item_code = it.name, `tabStock Entry` se

WHERE

sed.parent = se.name and
se.stock_entry_type = 'Manufacture' and
se.docstatus=1 and
sed.t_warehouse IS NOT NULL and 
sed.item_group = 'Semi-Finished Goods' and
se.company=%(company)s and
se.posting_date>=%(from_date)s and se.posting_date<=%(to_date)s
order by se.posting_date desc;

	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`item_group` as "Group:data:100",
	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`item_group` as "Category:data:100",
	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`item_name` as "Item:data:200",
	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.item_code as "Part No:data:100",
	"INR" as "Currency:50",
	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.rate as "Rate:Data:50",
	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.received_qty as "Qty:Float:100", 
	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.qty as "Approved Qty:Float:100", 
    `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.stock_uom as "Unit:Data:50",
    `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.amount as "Grand Total:Float:100",
    `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.net_amount as "Net Total:Float:100"
   
from
	`tabPurchase Receipt`, `tabPurchase Receipt Item`
where
	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`parent` = `tabPurchase Receipt`.`name`
	and `tabPurchase Receipt`.docstatus = 1
and `tabPurchase Receipt`.posting_date>=%(from_date)s and `tabPurchase Receipt`.posting_date<=%(to_date)s
Order by `tabPurchase Receipt`.posting_date asc

 cp.phone as "Contact Phone:100",

name: Material Issue DFM

  sd.item_name as "Item Name:100",

name: MRN Register DFM
query:
select 
    pr.name as "MRN No:Link/Purchase Receipt:150",
    pr.posting_date as "MRN Date:Date:100",
    pr.supplier as "Party Name:Supplier:100",
    pr.gate_entry_no as "Gate Entry No:100",
    pr.date as "Date:Date:100",
    pr.mrn_type as "MRN Type",
    pr.company as "Company",
    pr.supplier_bill_no as "Bill No:100",
    pr.supplier_invoice_date as "Bill Date:Date:100",
    pr.vehicle_no as "Vehicle No:100",
    pi.purchase_order as "PO:100",
    pi.po_qty as "PO QTY:Float:100",
    pi.invoice_quantity as "Invoice Qty:Float:100",
    pi.received_qty as "Received QTY:Float:100",
    pi.qty as "Approved Qty:Float:100",
     pi.short_quantity as "Short Qty:Float:100",
   pi.rejected_qty as "Rejected Qty:Float:100",
    pi.item_name as "Item:Data:200",
	pi.item_code as "Item Code:Data:100",
	pi.vendor_batch_no as "Vendor Batch No:Data:100",
	pi.batch_no as "Batch No:Data:100",
	pi.manufacturing_date as "Manufacturing Date:Date",
	pi.expiry_date as "Expiry Date:Date",
	pi.item_group as "Group Name:data:100",
	item.item_sub_group as "Item sub Group:100",
    item.category as "Category:data:100",
	pi.rate as "Rate:Data:50",
    pi.stock_uom as "Unit:Data:50",
    pi.amount as "Grand Total:Float:100",
    pi.net_amount as "Net Total:Float:100",
    pi.transfer_lot_no as "Transfer Lot No:100",
    item.product_line as "Product Line:100",
    item.product_category as "Product Category:100",
    item.price_category as "Price Category:100",
    item.product_Variant as "Product Variant:100",
    item.promo_code as "Promo Code:100",
    pi.warehouse as "Store:100"
from
	`tabPurchase Receipt` pr
	left join `tabPurchase Receipt Item` pi on pr.name = pi.parent
	left join `tabQuality Inspection` qi on  pi.quality_inspection=qi.name
	left join `tabItem` item on item.item_code=pi.item_code
where
   pr.docstatus=1 and
pr.posting_date >=%(from_date)s and pr.posting_date <=%(to_date)s and pr.company = %(company)s
order by pr.posting_date desc ;

name: Item Batch Expiry Within 7 Days DFM
query:
select
 b.batch_id as "Batch No",
 b.item as "Item Code",
 i.item_name as "Item Name",
 b.manufacturing_date as "Manufacturing Date:Date",
 b.expiry_date as "Expiry Date:Date",
 DATEDIFF(b.expiry_date,Now()) as "Expiry(In Days)"

From 
  `tabBatch` b , `tabItem` i
where  
 b.item = i.item_code and
  DATEDIFF(b.expiry_date,Now())<8 and DATEDIFF(b.expiry_date,Now())>-1

`tabPurchase Receipt`, `tabPurchase Receipt Item`,`tabItem` 
WHERE
`tabPurchase Receipt`.`is_return` = true and 
`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`parent`=`tabPurchase Receipt`.`name` and `tabItem`.item_code=`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.item_code

sed.basic_amount as "Basic Amount:Float",

name: Production Consumption 2
query:
select
se.name  as "No:Link/Stock Entry",
se.company as "Company",
se.stock_entry_type as "Stock Entry Type",
se.posting_date as "Date:Date",
se.posting_time as "Time:TIME",
se.work_order as "Work Order",
se.bom_no as "Bom No",
se.bom_item as "Bom Item:200",
se.fg_completed_qty as "Fg Quantity:Float",
sed.s_warehouse as "Source Warehouse",
sed.t_warehouse as "Target Warehouse",
sed.item_code as "Item Code",
sed.item_name as "Item Name",
sed.item_group as "Item Group",
case
    when sed.s_warehouse is NULL then -1*sed.qty else sed.qty end as "Quantity:Float",
sed.basic_rate as "Basic Rate:Float",
case
    when sed.s_warehouse is NULL then -1*sed.basic_amount else sed.basic_amount end as "Basic Amount:Float",
sed.additional_cost as "Additional Cost:Float",
case
    when sed.s_warehouse is NULL then -1*sed.amount  else sed.amount end as "Amount:Float",
sed.uom as "UOM",
sed.batch_no as "Batch No",
sed.expense_account as "Expense Account:Float",
sed.actual_qty as "Actual QTY:Float",
se.total_incoming_value as "Total Imcoming Value:Float",
se.total_outgoing_value as "Total Outgoing Value:Float",
se.value_difference as "Value Difference:Float"

from `tabStock Entry` se , `tabStock Entry Detail` sed
where 
sed.parent=se.name and 
se.stock_entry_type="Manufacture" and 
se.docstatus=1 and
sed.item_group != 'Finished Goods' and
se.company=%(company)s and
se.posting_date>=%(from_date)s and se.posting_date<=%(to_date)s
order by se.posting_date desc;

    when sed.s_warehouse is NULL then -1*sed.basic_amount else sed.basic_amount end as "Basic Amount:Float",

    when sed.s_warehouse is NULL then -1*sed.amount  else sed.amount end as "Amount:Float",

name: Warehouse Linewise Report
query:
select sle.item_code as "Item:Link/Item:120",
sed1.item_name as "Item Name:200",
sed1.item_group as "Item Group:Link/Item Group:200",
sed1.stock_uom as "Stock UOM:200",
sum(sle.actual_qty) as "Opening Qty:120",
sle.posting_date as "Posting Date:Date:200",
sed1.warehouse as "Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:200"
from 
(select sed.item_code,
sed.item_name,
sed.item_group,
if(sed.s_warehouse is not null,sed.s_warehouse,sed.t_warehouse)  as warehouse,
sed.stock_uom,
sed.parent as entry_name
from `tabStock Entry Detail` sed group by warehouse,sed.item_code) as sed1 left join
`tabStock Ledger Entry` sle on sed1.item_code=sle.item_code 
where sle.docstatus < 2 and sle.posting_date <= %(from_date)s
group by sed1.warehouse,sle.item_code

name: BOM vs Actual
report_script:
def get_exploded_items(bom,raw = {},s_q=0,n_q=0):
	bom_q = frappe.db.get_value('BOM',bom,'quantity')
	""" Get all raw materials including items from child bom"""
	items = frappe.db.sql("""select bi.item_code, bi.item_name, bi.bom_no, bi.stock_uom, bi.stock_qty, bi.net_qty, 
				bi.stock_qty / ifnull(%s, 1) AS stock_qty_consumed_per_unit, bi.net_qty / ifnull(%s, 1) AS net_qty_consumed_per_unit,
				 bi.include_item_in_manufacturing from `tabBOM Item` bi where bi.parent = %s"""%(bom_q,bom_q,frappe.db.escape(bom)), as_dict=1 )
	for d in items:
		if d['bom_no']:
			raw = get_exploded_items(d['bom_no'],raw,(s_q*d['stock_qty_consumed_per_unit']),(n_q*d['net_qty_consumed_per_unit']))
			#frappe.msgprint(str(raw))
		else:
			if d['item_code'] in raw:
				#frappe.msgprint(str(d['item_code']))
				raw[d['item_code']] = {
					'stock_entry'				: '',
					'item_name'				: d['item_name'],
					'stock_uom'				: d['stock_uom'],
					'stock_qty'				: raw[d['item_code']]['stock_qty'] + d['stock_qty_consumed_per_unit'] * s_q,
					'net_qty'				: raw[d['item_code']]['net_qty']  + d['net_qty_consumed_per_unit'] * n_q,
					'consumed_qty'                          : 0,
					'yield'					: 0,
					'include_item_in_manufacturing': d.get('include_item_in_manufacturing', 0)
				}
				#frappe.msgprint(str(raw[d['item_code']]))

			else:
				raw[d['item_code']] = {
					'stock_entry'				: '',
					'item_name'				: d['item_name'],
					'stock_uom'				: d['stock_uom'],
					'stock_qty'				: d['stock_qty_consumed_per_unit'] * s_q,
					'net_qty'				: d['net_qty_consumed_per_unit'] * n_q,
					'consumed_qty'				: 0,
					'yield'					: 0,
					'include_item_in_manufacturing': d.get('include_item_in_manufacturing', 0)
                                }
				#frappe.msgprint(str(raw[d['item_code']]))

	return raw
	


	
def get_data(filters):
    conditions = ""
    if filters.get("from_date"):
	    conditions += " and date >= '%s'" % filters["from_date"]

    if filters.get("to_date"):
	    conditions += " and date <= '%s'" % filters["to_date"]

    if filters.get("company"):
	    conditions += " and company = '%s'" % filters["company"]
    else:
	    frappe.throw('Please Select company first')
	    
    d=frappe.db.sql("""SELECT company, production_plan ,name as work_order ,qty as fg_qty, produced_qty,
	production_item as fg_item, item_name as fg_name, bom_no FROM `tabWork Order` where docstatus = 1 and produced_qty > 0 %s """%conditions,as_dict=1)
	
    for r in d:
        r[r['work_order']]=get_exploded_items(r['bom_no'],{},r['fg_qty'],r['fg_qty'])
        se_name=frappe.get_list('Stock Entry',{'work_order': r['work_order']},'name')
        for se in se_name:
            temp=frappe.db.sql("""select item_code,sum(qty) as qty from `tabStock Entry Detail` sed, `tabStock Entry` se where sed.parent=%s and sed.parent = se.name and se.docstatus=1 and item_group!='Finished Goods' group by item_code""",se['name'],as_dict=1)
            for t in temp:
                try:
                    r[r['work_order']][t['item_code']]['stock_entry'] = se['name']
                    r[r['work_order']][t['item_code']]['consumed_qty'] = t['qty']
                    r[r['work_order']][t['item_code']]['yield'] = (t['qty']/r[r['work_order']][t['item_code']]['stock_qty'])*100 
                except:
                    pass
    return d



def get_columns(filters):
	"""return columns"""
	columns = [
		{"label": "Company", "fieldname": "company", "fieldtype": "Link", "options": "Company", "width": 150},
		{"label": "Production Plan", "fieldname": "production_plan", "fieldtype": "Link", "options": "Production Plan", "width": 150},
		{"label": "Work Order", "fieldname": "work_order", "fieldtype": "Link", "options": "Work Order", "width": 150},
		{"label": "BOM No.", "fieldname": "bom_no", "fieldtype": "Link", "options": "BOM", "width": 150},
		{"label": "FG Item", "fieldname": "fg_item", "fieldtype": "Data", "width": 120},
		{"label": "FG Name", "fieldname": "fg_name", "fieldtype": "Data", "width": 180},
		{"label": "FG Item Qty", "fieldname": "fg_qty", "fieldtype": "Float", "width": 100},
		{"label": "FG Produced Qty", "fieldname": "produced_qty", "fieldtype": "Float", "width": 100},
		{"label": "Consumed Items", "fieldname": "item_code", "fieldtype": "Link", "options": "Item", "width": 100},
		{"label": "Item Name", "fieldname": "item_name", "fieldtype": "Data", "width": 100},
		{"label": "Stock Entry", "fieldname": "stock_entry", "fieldtype": "Link", "options": "Stock Entry", "width": 150},
		{"label": "Net Qty", "fieldname": "net_qty", "fieldtype": "Float", "width": 100},
		{"label": "Gross Qty", "fieldname": "stock_qty", "fieldtype": "Float", "width": 100},
		{"label": "Consumed Qty", "fieldname": "consumed_qty", "fieldtype": "Float", "width": 100},
		{"label": "% Yield", "fieldname": "yield", "fieldtype": "Float", "width": 100}
	]

	return columns
	

	
columns = get_columns(filters)
temp_data = get_data(filters)
#print(temp_data[0])
list = []
for d in temp_data:
	#print(d)
	for item in d[d['work_order']]:
		list.append([d['company'], d['production_plan'], d['work_order'], d['bom_no'], d['fg_item'],d['fg_name'], d['fg_qty'], d['produced_qty'], item, d[d['work_order']][item]['item_name'],
		d[d['work_order']][item]['stock_entry'],d[d['work_order']][item]['net_qty'], d[d['work_order']][item]['stock_qty'], d[d['work_order']][item]['consumed_qty'], d[d['work_order']][item]['yield']  
		])

data = [columns, list]

query:
SELECT

(case when sle.posting_date < Date(%(from_date)s) then qty_after_transaction else 0 end) as "Before Transaction Qty",
/*(case when sle.posting_date < Date(%(from_date)s) then valuation_rate else 0 end) as "Before Transaction Rate",

(case when sle.voucher_type = "Purchase Receipt" then sum(sle.actual_qty) else 0  end) as "Purchase Qty",
/*(case when sle.posting_date < Date(%(from_date)s) then valuation_rate else 0 end) as "Before Transaction Rate",
(case when sle.posting_date < Date(%(from_date)s) then valuation_rate else 0 end) as "Stock value",*/
(case when sle.posting_date >= Date(%(from_date)s) then qty_after_transaction else 0 end) as "Balance Transaction Qty",

sle.posting_date as "Posting Date",
sle.voucher_type,
sle.warehouse,
sle.company

FROM
  `tabStock Ledger Entry` sle group by item_code

def condition(filters):
    cond = ''
    if filters.get("from_date"):
        cond = cond + f"""where l.creation >= "{filters.get('from_date')}" """

    if filters.get("to_date"):
        cond = cond + f"""where l.creation <= "{filters.get('to_date')}" """

    return cond


cond = condition(filters)

res = frappe.db.sql(f"""select 
w.company as Company,
w.parent as "Work Order",
w.bom_no as "Bom No",
w.fg_item as "Fg Item",
w.fg_item_name as "Fg Name",
w.fg_qty as "Fg Qty",
w.Produced_qty as "Produced Qty",
w.item_code as "Consumed Item",
w.Item_Name as "Item Name",
s.name as "Stock Entry",
w.Gross_QTY as "Gross Qty",
s.consumed_qty as "Consumed Qty"



from

(select 
se.name,
se.work_order,
sed.item_code,
sed.item_name,
sed.parent,
sum(sed.qty) as consumed_qty
from `tabStock Entry` as se left join `tabStock Entry Detail` as sed 
on se.name=sed.parent
group by sed.item_code,se.work_order,se.name) as s right join 

(select 
wo.company as company,
wo.name,
wo.bom_no,
wo.production_item as fg_item,
wo.item_name as fg_item_name,
wo.qty as fg_qty,
wo.produced_qty as Produced_qty,
woi.parent,
woi.item_code,
woi.item_name as "Item_Name",
woi.required_qty as "Gross_QTY"
from `tabWork Order` as wo left join `tabWork Order Item` as woi
on wo.name=woi.parent
where wo.status!="Not Started" and wo.docstatus!=0) as w
on w.parent=s.work_order and w.item_code=s.item_code
group by s.work_order,s.item_code,s.name
order by s.name
""",as_dict = 1)

name: Received Items To Be Billed Dup
query:
select
    `tabPurchase Receipt`.`name` as "Purchase Receipt:Link/Purchase Receipt:120",
    `tabPurchase Receipt`.`supplier` as "Supplier:Link/Supplier:120",
	`tabPurchase Receipt`.`supplier_name` as "Supplier Name::150",
	`tabPurchase Receipt`.`posting_date` as "Date:Date",
	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`project` as "Project",
	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`item_code` as "Item:Link/Item:120",
	(`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`base_amount` - `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`billed_amt`*ifnull(`tabPurchase Receipt`.conversion_rate, 1)) as "Pending Amount:Currency:110",
	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`item_name` as "Item Name::150",
	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`description` as "Description::200",
	`tabPurchase Receipt`.`company` as "Company:Link/Company:"
from `tabPurchase Receipt`, `tabPurchase Receipt Item`
where
    `tabPurchase Receipt`.name = `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.parent 
    and `tabPurchase Receipt`.docstatus = 1 
    and `tabPurchase Receipt`.status != "Closed" 
    and `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.amount > 0
    and `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.billed_amt < `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.amount
order by `tabPurchase Receipt`.`name` desc

 /* wo.name as "Work Order:Link/Work Order:200",

name: Open Work Orders Dup
query:
SELECT
  `tabWork Order`.name as "Work Order:Link/Work Order:200",
  `tabWork Order`.creation as "Date:Date:120",
  `tabWork Order`.production_item as "Item:Link/Item:150",
  `tabWork Order`.qty as "To Produce:Int:100",
  `tabWork Order`.produced_qty as "Produced:Int:100",
  `tabWork Order`.company as "Company:Link/Company:"

  `tabWork Order`

  `tabWork Order`.docstatus=1

 `tabSales Order`.`name` as "Sales Order:Link/Sales Order:120",
 `tabSales Order`.`customer` as "Customer:Link/Customer:120",
  `tabSales Order`.`customer_name` as "Customer Name:150",
`tabSales Order`.`status` as "Status",
 `tabSales Order`.`transaction_date` as "Date:Date",
 `tabSales Order`.`project` as "Project",
 `tabSales Order Item`.item_code as "Item:Link/Item:120",

 (`tabSales Order Item`.billed_amt * ifnull(`tabSales Order`.conversion_rate, 1)) as "Billed Amount:Currency:110",
 (`tabSales Order Item`.base_amount - (`tabSales Order Item`.billed_amt * ifnull(`tabSales Order`.conversion_rate, 1))) as "Pending Amount:Currency:120",
 `tabSales Order Item`.item_name as "Item Name::150",

 `tabSales Order`.`company` as "Company:Link/Company:"

 `tabSales Order`, `tabSales Order Item`

name: Issued Items Against Work Order
query:
select
    ste.work_order as "Work Order:Link/Work Order:120",
    ste.posting_date as "Issue Date:Date:140",
    ste_item.item_code as "Item Code:Link/Item:120",
	ste_item.description as "Description::150",
	ste_item.transfer_qty as "Qty:Float:100",
	ste_item.stock_uom as "UOM:Link/UOM:80",
	ste_item.amount as "Amount:Currency:120",
	ste_item.serial_no as "Serial No:Link/Serial No:80",
	ste_item.s_warehouse as "Source Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:120",
	ste_item.t_warehouse as "Target Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:120",
	wo.production_item as "Finished Goods:Link/Item:120", 
	ste.name as "Stock Entry:Link/Stock Entry:120",
	ste.company as "Company:Link/Company:",
	(select bin.projected_qty from `tabBin` bin 
			where  bin.item_code= ste_item.item_code and bin.warehouse= ste_item.s_warehouse) as "Projected Quantity as Source:Float:200"
from	`tabStock Entry` ste, `tabStock Entry Detail` ste_item, `tabWork Order` wo
where
	ifnull(ste.work_order, '') != '' and ste.name = ste_item.parent 
	and ste.work_order = wo.name and ste.docstatus = 1
	and ste.purpose = 'Material Transfer for Manufacture'
order by ste.posting_date, ste.work_order, ste_item.item_code

name: Sales Partners Commission
query:
SELECT
    sales_partner as "Sales Partner:Link/Sales Partner:150",
	sum(base_net_total) as "Invoiced Amount (Exclusive Tax):Currency:210",
	sum(total_commission) as "Total Commission:Currency:150",
	sum(total_commission)*100/sum(base_net_total) as "Average Commission Rate:Currency:170"
FROM
	`tabSales Invoice`
WHERE
	docstatus = 1 and ifnull(base_net_total, 0) > 0 and ifnull(total_commission, 0) > 0
GROUP BY
	sales_partner
ORDER BY
	"Total Commission:Currency:120"

Requested Items To Be Ordered
query:
select 
    mr.name as "Material Request:Link/Material Request:120",
	mr.transaction_date as "Date:Date:100",
	mr_item.item_code as "Item Code:Link/Item:120",
	sum(ifnull(mr_item.stock_qty, 0)) as "Qty:Float:100",
	ifnull(mr_item.stock_uom, '') as "UOM:Link/UOM:100",
	sum(ifnull(mr_item.ordered_qty, 0)) as "Ordered Qty:Float:100", 
	(sum(mr_item.stock_qty) - sum(ifnull(mr_item.ordered_qty, 0))) as "Qty to Order:Float:100",
	mr_item.item_name as "Item Name::150",
	mr_item.description as "Description::200",
	mr.company as "Company:Link/Company:"
from
	`tabMaterial Request` mr, `tabMaterial Request Item` mr_item
where
	mr_item.parent = mr.name
	and mr.material_request_type = "Purchase"
	and mr.docstatus = 1
	and mr.status != "Stopped"
group by mr.name, mr_item.item_code
having
	sum(ifnull(mr_item.ordered_qty, 0)) < sum(ifnull(mr_item.stock_qty, 0))
order by mr.transaction_date asc

name: Requested Items To Be Transferred
query:
select 
    mr.name as "Material Request:Link/Material Request:120",
	mr.transaction_date as "Date:Date:100",
	mr_item.item_code as "Item Code:Link/Item:120",
	mr_item.qty as "Qty:Float:100",
	mr_item.ordered_qty as "Transferred Qty:Float:100", 
	(mr_item.qty - ifnull(mr_item.ordered_qty, 0)) as "Qty to Transfer:Float:100",
	mr_item.item_name as "Item Name::150",
	mr_item.description as "Description::200",
	mr.company as "Company:Link/Company:"
from
	`tabMaterial Request` mr, `tabMaterial Request Item` mr_item
where
	mr_item.parent = mr.name
	and mr.material_request_type in ("Material Transfer", "Material Issue")
	and mr.docstatus = 1
	and mr.status != "Stopped"
	and ifnull(mr_item.ordered_qty, 0) < ifnull(mr_item.qty, 0)
order by mr.transaction_date asc

query:
select
    `tabDelivery Note`.`name` as "Delivery Note:Link/Delivery Note:120",
	`tabDelivery Note`.`customer` as "Customer:Link/Customer:120",
	`tabDelivery Note`.`customer_name` as "Customer Name::150",
	`tabDelivery Note`.`posting_date` as "Date:Date",
	`tabDelivery Note`.`project` as "Project",
	`tabDelivery Note Item`.`item_code` as "Item:Link/Item:120",
	(`tabDelivery Note Item`.`base_amount` - `tabDelivery Note Item`.`billed_amt`*ifnull(`tabDelivery Note`.conversion_rate, 1)) as "Pending Amount:Currency:110",
	`tabDelivery Note Item`.`item_name` as "Item Name::150",
	`tabDelivery Note Item`.`description` as "Description::200",
	`tabDelivery Note`.`company` as "Company:Link/Company:"
from `tabDelivery Note`, `tabDelivery Note Item`
where  
    `tabDelivery Note`.name = `tabDelivery Note Item`.parent 
    and `tabDelivery Note`.docstatus = 1 
    and `tabDelivery Note`.`status` not in ("Stopped", "Closed") 
    and `tabDelivery Note Item`.amount > 0
    and `tabDelivery Note Item`.billed_amt < `tabDelivery Note Item`.amount
order by `tabDelivery Note`.`name` desc

name: Received Items To Be Billed
query:
select
    `tabPurchase Receipt`.`name` as "Purchase Receipt:Link/Purchase Receipt:120",
    `tabPurchase Receipt`.`supplier` as "Supplier:Link/Supplier:120",
	`tabPurchase Receipt`.`supplier_name` as "Supplier Name::150",
	`tabPurchase Receipt`.`posting_date` as "Date:Date",
	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`project` as "Project",
	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`item_code` as "Item:Link/Item:120",
	(`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`base_amount` - `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`billed_amt`*ifnull(`tabPurchase Receipt`.conversion_rate, 1)) as "Pending Amount:Currency:110",
	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`item_name` as "Item Name::150",
	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`description` as "Description::200",
	`tabPurchase Receipt`.`company` as "Company:Link/Company:"
from `tabPurchase Receipt`, `tabPurchase Receipt Item`
where
    `tabPurchase Receipt`.name = `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.parent 
    and `tabPurchase Receipt`.docstatus = 1 
    and `tabPurchase Receipt`.status != "Closed" 
    and `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.amount > 0
    and `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.billed_amt < `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.amount
order by `tabPurchase Receipt`.`name` desc

name: Material Requests for which Supplier Quotations are not created
query:
select 
    mr.name as "Material Request:Link/Material Request:120",
    mr.transaction_date as "Date:Date:100",
	mr_item.item_code as "Item Code:Link/Item:120",
	mr_item.qty as "Qty:Float:100",
	mr_item.item_name as "Item Name::150",
	mr_item.description as "Description::200",
	mr.company as "Company:Link/Company:"
from
	`tabMaterial Request` mr, `tabMaterial Request Item` mr_item
where
	mr_item.parent = mr.name
	and mr.material_request_type = "Purchase"
	and mr.docstatus = 1
	and mr.status != "Stopped"
	and not exists(select name from `tabSupplier Quotation Item` where material_request=mr.name)
order by mr.transaction_date asc
report_name: Material Requests for which Supplier Quotations are not created

name: Open Work Orders
query:
SELECT
  `tabWork Order`.name as "Work Order:Link/Work Order:200",
  `tabWork Order`.creation as "Date:Date:120",
  `tabWork Order`.production_item as "Item:Link/Item:150",
  `tabWork Order`.qty as "To Produce:Int:100",
  `tabWork Order`.produced_qty as "Produced:Int:100",
  `tabWork Order`.company as "Company:Link/Company:"
FROM
  `tabWork Order`
WHERE
  `tabWork Order`.docstatus=1
  AND ifnull(`tabWork Order`.produced_qty,0) < `tabWork Order`.qty
  AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT name from `tabStock Entry` where work_order =`tabWork Order`.name)

name: Work Orders in Progress
query:
SELECT
  `tabWork Order`.name as "Work Order:Link/Work Order:200",
  `tabWork Order`.creation as "Date:Date:120",
  `tabWork Order`.production_item as "Item:Link/Item:150",
  `tabWork Order`.qty as "To Produce:Int:100",
  `tabWork Order`.produced_qty as "Produced:Int:100",
  `tabWork Order`.company as "Company:Link/Company:"
FROM
  `tabWork Order`
WHERE
  `tabWork Order`.docstatus=1
  AND `tabWork Order`.status != 'Stopped'
  AND ifnull(`tabWork Order`.produced_qty,0) < `tabWork Order`.qty
  AND EXISTS (SELECT name from `tabStock Entry` where work_order =`tabWork Order`.name)

name: Completed Work Orders
query:
SELECT
  `tabWork Order`.name as "Work Order:Link/Work Order:200",
  `tabWork Order`.creation as "Date:Date:120",
  `tabWork Order`.production_item as "Item:Link/Item:150",
  `tabWork Order`.qty as "To Produce:Int:100",
  `tabWork Order`.produced_qty as "Produced:Int:100",
  `tabWork Order`.company as "Company:Link/Company:"
FROM
  `tabWork Order`
WHERE
  `tabWork Order`.docstatus=1
  AND ifnull(`tabWork Order`.produced_qty,0) = `tabWork Order`.qty

name: Item Shortage Report
query:
SELECT  bin.warehouse as "Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:150",
	bin.item_code as "Item Code:Link/Item:100",
	bin.actual_qty as "Actual Quantity:Float:120",
	bin.ordered_qty as "Ordered Quantity:Float:120",
	bin.planned_qty as "Planned Quantity:Float:120",
	bin.reserved_qty as "Reserved Quantity:Float:120",
	bin.projected_qty as "Project Quantity:Float:120",
	item.item_name as "Item Name:Data:150",
	item.description as "Description::200"
FROM tabBin as bin
INNER JOIN tabItem as item
ON bin.item_code=item.name
WHERE bin.projected_qty<0
ORDER BY bin.projected_qty;

name: Items To Be Requested
query:
SELECT
    tabBin.item_code as "Item:Link/Item:120",
    tabBin.warehouse as "Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:120",
    tabBin.actual_qty as "Actual:Float:90",
    tabBin.indented_qty as "Requested:Float:90",
    tabBin.reserved_qty as "Reserved:Float:90",
    tabBin.ordered_qty as "Ordered:Float:90",
    tabBin.projected_qty as "Projected:Float:90"
FROM
    tabBin, tabItem
WHERE
    tabBin.item_code = tabItem.name
   AND tabBin.projected_qty < 0
ORDER BY
    tabBin.projected_qty ASC

Lead Details
query:
SELECT
    `tabLead`.name as "Lead Id:Link/Lead:120",
    `tabLead`.lead_name as "Lead Name::120",
	`tabLead`.company_name as "Company Name::120",
	`tabLead`.status as "Status::120",
	concat_ws(', ', 
		trim(',' from `tabAddress`.address_line1), 
		trim(',' from tabAddress.address_line2)
	) as 'Address::180',
	`tabAddress`.state as "State::100",
	`tabAddress`.pincode as "Pincode::70",
	`tabAddress`.country as "Country::100",
	`tabLead`.phone as "Phone::100",
	`tabLead`.mobile_no as "Mobile No::100",
	`tabLead`.email_id as "Email Id::120",
	`tabLead`.lead_owner as "Lead Owner::120",
	`tabLead`.source as "Source::120",
	`tabLead`.territory as "Territory::120",
	`tabLead`.notes as "Notes::360",
    `tabLead`.owner as "Owner:Link/User:120"
FROM
	`tabLead`
	left join `tabDynamic Link` on (
		`tabDynamic Link`.link_name=`tabLead`.name 
		and `tabDynamic Link`.parenttype = 'Address'
	)
	left join `tabAddress` on (
		`tabAddress`.name=`tabDynamic Link`.parent
	)
WHERE
	`tabLead`.docstatus<2
ORDER BY
	`tabLead`.name asc

name: Student Fee Collection
query:
SELECT
 student as "Student:Link/Student:200",
 student_name as "Student Name::200",
 sum(grand_total) - sum(outstanding_amount) as "Paid Amount:Currency:150",
 sum(outstanding_amount) as "Outstanding Amount:Currency:150",
 sum(grand_total) as "Grand Total:Currency:150"
FROM
 `tabFees` 
GROUP BY
 student
